dev.description: Weight Loss workout plan for Beginner level with Full Gym
dev.plan:
Day 1: Full Body Strength Training A

• Warm-up: 5-10 minutes light cardio (treadmill/elliptical)
• Goblet Squat (Dumbbell): 3 sets of 12-15 reps
• Dumbbell Bench Press (or Machine Chest Press): 3 sets of 10-12 reps
• Lat Pulldown (Machine): 3 sets of 10-12 reps
• Seated Dumbbell Shoulder Press (or Machine Shoulder Press): 3 sets of 10-12 reps
• Plank: 3 sets, hold 30-45 seconds
• Cool-down: 5 minutes stretching

Day 2: Cardio and Core Focus

• Warm-up: 5 minutes dynamic stretches
• Incline Treadmill Walk or Elliptical: 30-40 minutes (moderate intensity)
• Bicycle Crunches: 3 sets of 15-20 reps per side
• Russian Twists (with light dumbbell or bodyweight): 3 sets of 15-20 reps per side
• Leg Raises: 3 sets of 15-20 reps
• Cool-down: 5 minutes stretching

Day 3: Full Body Strength Training B

• Warm-up: 5-10 minutes light cardio
• Leg Press (Machine): 3 sets of 12-15 reps
• Seated Cable Row (or Dumbbell Row): 3 sets of 10-12 reps
• Push-ups (on knees or full, as able): 3 sets of 8-12 reps
• Dumbbell Bicep Curls: 3 sets of 12-15 reps
• Cable Triceps Pushdowns: 3 sets of 12-15 reps
• Cool-down: 5 minutes stretching

Day 4: Active Recovery and Light Bodyweight

• Warm-up: 5 minutes light movement
• Stationary Bike (moderate pace): 30 minutes
• Bodyweight Lunges: 3 sets of 10-12 reps per leg
• Bird-Dog: 3 sets of 10-12 reps per side
• Cat-Cow Stretch: 3 sets of 10-12 repetitions
• Cool-down: 5 minutes gentle stretching

Day 5: Full Body Strength Training C

• Warm-up: 5-10 minutes light cardio
• Glute Bridge (Bodyweight or with Dumbbell/Barbell on hips): 3 sets of 12-15 reps
• Machine Chest Fly (or Dumbbell Flyes): 3 sets of 12-15 reps
• Cable Face Pulls: 3 sets of 15-20 reps
• Dumbbell Lateral Raises: 3 sets of 12-15 reps
• Wall Sit: 3 sets, hold 30-45 seconds
• Cool-down: 5 minutes stretching

Day 6: Moderate Cardio and Bodyweight Finisher

• Warm-up: 5 minutes dynamic stretches
• Varied Cardio (Treadmill, Elliptical, Stair Climber): 25-30 minutes (moderate intensity, vary equipment if desired)
• Bodyweight Squats: 3 sets of 15-20 reps
• Mountain Climbers: 3 sets of 30-45 seconds
• Superman: 3 sets of 12-15 reps
• Cool-down: 5 minutes stretching

Day 7: Rest Day

• Rest completely, or engage in light active recovery such as a leisurely walk or gentle stretching/yoga for 30-45 minutes.

dev.description: Muscle Building workout plan for Advanced level with Full Gym
dev.plan:
Day 1: Chest & Triceps (Strength & Hypertrophy)

• Barbell Bench Press: 4x5-7 (heavy)
• Incline Dumbbell Press: 3x8-10
• Machine Chest Press: 3x10-12 (dropset last set)
• Cable Crossovers (Low-to-High): 3x12-15
• Close-Grip Bench Press: 3x6-8
• Overhead Dumbbell Extension: 3x10-12
• Tricep Rope Pushdowns: 3x12-15 (partial reps last set)

Day 2: Back & Biceps (Strength & Hypertrophy)

• Bent-Over Barbell Rows: 4x6-8 (heavy)
• Pull-ups: 3 sets to failure (weighted if possible)
• T-Bar Rows: 3x8-10
• Lat Pulldowns: 3x10-12 (supersets with Straight Arm Pulldowns)
• Barbell Curls: 3x8-10
• Incline Dumbbell Curls: 3x10-12
• Hammer Curls: 3x10-12

Day 3: Legs (Quads Dominant) & Calves

• Barbell Back Squats: 4x5-7 (heavy)
• Leg Press: 3x8-10 (dropset last set)
• Hack Squats: 3x10-12
• Leg Extensions: 3x12-15 (supersets with Sissy Squats)
• Romanian Deadlifts (Barbell): 3x8-10
• Standing Calf Raises: 4x10-15 (slow eccentric)
• Seated Calf Raises: 3x15-20

Day 4: Shoulders & Traps & Abs (Hypertrophy)

• Overhead Barbell Press (Seated): 4x6-8
• Dumbbell Lateral Raises: 4x10-15 (partial reps at end)
• Reverse Pec Deck Flyes (Rear Delts): 3x12-15
• Face Pulls: 3x15-20
• Dumbbell Shrugs: 3x10-12 (hold at top)
• Barbell Shrugs: 3x8-10 (heavy)
• Cable Crunches: 3x15-20
• Hanging Leg Raises: 3x15-20

Day 5: Chest & Back (Volume & Pump - Antagonist Supersets)

• Superset 1: Incline Dumbbell Press 3x10-12 & Wide-Grip Pulldowns 3x10-12
• Superset 2: Flat Dumbbell Flyes 3x12-15 & Seated Cable Rows 3x12-15
• Superset 3: Pec Deck Flyes 3x15-20 & Hyperextensions (weighted) 3x15-20
• Push-ups: 2 sets to failure

Day 6: Legs (Hamstring Dominant) & Glutes

• Barbell Romanian Deadlifts: 4x6-8 (heavy)
• Lying Leg Curls: 3x10-12 (dropset last set)
• Glute-Ham Raises (or Good Mornings): 3x10-12
• Bulgarian Split Squats: 3x10-12 per leg
• Barbell Hip Thrusts: 3x8-12
• Walking Lunges (Dumbbell): 3x10-12 per leg

Day 7: Arms (High Frequency & Pump) & Forearms

• Superset 1: EZ Bar Curls 3x10-12 & Skullcrushers 3x10-12
• Superset 2: Concentration Curls 3x12-15 & Tricep Kickbacks 3x12-15
• Superset 3: Cable Curls (rope) 3x12-15 & Cable Overhead Extension (rope) 3x12-15
• Barbell Forearm Curls: 3x15-20
• Reverse Barbell Curls: 3x12-15

dev.description: Muscle Building workout plan for Intermediate level with Full Gym
dev.plan:
Day 1: Upper Body Strength - Focus on compound movements and heavier loads. Warm-up (5-10 min cardio, dynamic stretches), then main workout, cool-down (static stretches).

• Barbell Bench Press: 4x6-8
• Pull-ups (Weighted if possible) or Lat Pulldowns: 4x6-10
• Barbell Overhead Press: 3x6-8
• Barbell Rows: 3x6-8
• Incline Dumbbell Press: 3x8-10
• Dumbbell Bicep Curls: 3x10-12
• Triceps Pushdowns (Rope or Bar): 3x10-12

Day 2: Lower Body Strength - Emphasize foundational leg exercises. Warm-up (5-10 min cardio, dynamic stretches), then main workout, cool-down (static stretches).

• Barbell Squats: 4x6-8
• Romanian Deadlifts (Barbell): 3x8-10
• Leg Press: 3x10-12
• Walking Lunges (Dumbbell): 3x10-12 per leg
• Leg Curls (Machine): 3x12-15
• Standing Calf Raises: 4x10-15

Day 3: Push (Chest, Shoulders, Triceps Hypertrophy) - Higher volume, moderate weight. Warm-up (5-10 min cardio, dynamic stretches), then main workout, cool-down (static stretches).

• Incline Dumbbell Press: 3x10-12
• Flat Dumbbell Flyes: 3x12-15
• Seated Dumbbell Shoulder Press: 3x10-12
• Lateral Raises (Dumbbell): 4x12-15
• Cable Triceps Pushdowns (Rope): 4x10-15
• Overhead Dumbbell Extension: 3x10-12

Day 4: Pull (Back, Biceps Hypertrophy) - Focus on muscle contraction and form. Warm-up (5-10 min cardio, dynamic stretches), then main workout, cool-down (static stretches).

• Lat Pulldowns (Wide Grip): 3x10-12
• Seated Cable Rows: 3x10-12
• Single Arm Dumbbell Rows: 3x10-12 per arm
• Face Pulls: 3x15-20
• Barbell Curls: 3x10-12
• Hammer Curls (Dumbbell): 3x10-12

Day 5: Legs & Core Hypertrophy - Target all major leg muscles and core stability. Warm-up (5-10 min cardio, dynamic stretches), then main workout, cool-down (static stretches).

• Front Squats: 3x8-10
• Leg Extensions: 3x12-15
• Glute-Ham Raises or Good Mornings: 3x10-12
• Goblet Squats: 3x12-15
• Cable Crunches: 3x15-20
• Plank: 3 sets to failure (hold for 45-60 seconds)

Day 6: Full Body/Active Recovery - Lighter intensity, focus on form and hitting muscles from different angles. Can also be a dedicated cardio/mobility day if preferred. Warm-up and cool-down.

• Dumbbell Goblet Squats: 3x12-15
• Push-ups (Weighted if easy) or Machine Chest Press: 3x12-15
• Inverted Rows or Machine Rows: 3x12-15
• Standing Dumbbell Shoulder Press: 3x12-15
• Bicep Cable Curls: 3x15-20
• Triceps Rope Pushdowns: 3x15-20

Day 7: Rest or Active Recovery - Allow your body to recover and grow. Focus on light activity like walking, stretching, or foam rolling. Prioritize sleep and nutrition for muscle repair.

• Active Recovery (e.g., 30-45 minutes light walk, yoga, stretching, foam rolling)
• No structured gym exercises

dev.description: Muscle Building workout plan for Beginner level with Full Gym
dev.plan:
Day 1: Full Body Workout A - Focus on fundamental movements and building strength across major muscle groups.

• Barbell Squat: 3x8-12
• Dumbbell Bench Press: 3x10-12
• Lat Pulldown: 3x10-12
• Dumbbell Overhead Press: 3x10-12
• Plank: 3x30-45 seconds (hold)

Day 2: Active Recovery or Rest - Light activity such as walking, stretching, or foam rolling to aid recovery and flexibility.

• Light Cardio (e.g., brisk walk): 30-45 minutes
• Stretching/Foam Rolling: 15-20 minutes

Day 3: Full Body Workout B - Introducing new exercises to stimulate different muscle fibers and continue progress.

• Leg Press: 3x10-12
• Machine Chest Press: 3x10-12
• Seated Cable Row: 3x10-12
• Dumbbell Bicep Curl: 3x10-12
• Overhead Dumbbell Extension: 3x10-12

Day 4: Active Recovery or Rest - Essential for muscle repair and growth. Focus on low-intensity activities.

• Light Cardio (e.g., cycling): 30-45 minutes
• Dynamic Stretching: 15-20 minutes

Day 5: Full Body Workout C - Incorporating exercises that challenge stability and target muscles from different angles.

• Dumbbell Romanian Deadlift: 3x10-12
• Incline Dumbbell Press: 3x10-12
• Face Pulls: 3x12-15
• Dumbbell Lunges (per leg): 3x10-12
• Calf Raises (Machine or Dumbbell): 3x15-20

Day 6: Rest - Complete rest day to allow your body to fully recover and prepare for the next training week.

• No formal exercise recommended today. Focus on hydration and nutrition.

Day 7: Rest - Another full rest day. Listen to your body and prioritize sleep for optimal recovery and muscle growth.

• No formal exercise recommended today. Enjoy your day off.

dev.description: Weight Loss workout plan for Intermediate level with Home Gym
dev.plan:
Day 1: Full Body Strength

• Dumbbell Goblet Squats: 3x10-12
• Dumbbell Bent-Over Rows: 3x10-12
• Push-ups: 3xMax Reps
• Dumbbell Reverse Lunges (alternating): 3x10-12 per leg
• Dumbbell Overhead Press: 3x10-12
• Plank: 3x30-60 seconds hold

Day 2: HIIT Cardio & Core

• Jump Rope Warm-up: 5 minutes
• HIIT Circuit (3-4 rounds, 45s work, 15s rest): Jump Squats, Mountain Climbers, Burpees, High Knees, Jumping Jacks
• Bicycle Crunches: 3x15-20 per side
• Russian Twists (with light dumbbell): 3x20-30 total
• Leg Raises: 3x15-20

Day 3: Upper Body Strength Focus

• Dumbbell Floor Press: 3x10-12
• Dumbbell Bicep Curls: 3x10-12
• Dumbbell Overhead Triceps Extension: 3x10-12
• Dumbbell Lateral Raises: 3x12-15
• Resistance Band Rows (or Dumbbell Rows): 3x10-12
• Incline Push-ups (on bench/chair): 3xMax Reps

Day 4: Lower Body Strength Focus

• Dumbbell Romanian Deadlifts: 3x10-12
• Glute Bridges (with dumbbell on hips): 3x12-15
• Dumbbell Step-Ups (on chair/bench): 3x10-12 per leg
• Standing Calf Raises (with dumbbell): 3x15-20
• Wall Sit: 3x30-60 seconds hold
• Resistance Band Lateral Walks: 3x10-12 per side

Day 5: Active Recovery & Core

• LISS Cardio: Jump Rope (steady pace) 30 minutes
• Side Plank: 3x30-45 seconds per side
• Bird-Dog: 3x10-12 per side
• Crunches: 3x15-20
• Gentle Stretching/Mobility: 10-15 minutes

Day 6: Full Body Challenge

• Dumbbell Thrusters: 3x10-12
• Renegade Rows: 3x8-10 per side
• Pike Push-ups: 3xMax Reps
• Dumbbell Sumo Squats: 3x12-15
• Resistance Band Pull-Aparts: 3x15-20
• Hollow Body Hold: 3x30-45 seconds

Day 7: Rest & Mobility

• Complete Rest or light stretching/foam rolling for 20-30 minutes focusing on major muscle groups and areas of tightness.

dev.description: Strength Training workout plan for Beginner level with Home Gym
dev.plan:
Upper body workout - Day 1

• Exercise 1: 3 sets of 10-15 • Exercise 2: 3 sets of 8-12 • Stretch: 5-10 minutes

Lower body workout - Day 2

• Exercise 1: 3 sets of 10-15 • Exercise 2: 3 sets of 8-12 • Stretch: 5-10 minutes

Cardio workout - Day 3

• Exercise 1: 3 sets of 10-15 • Exercise 2: 3 sets of 8-12 • Stretch: 5-10 minutes

Core workout - Day 4

• Exercise 1: 3 sets of 10-15 • Exercise 2: 3 sets of 8-12 • Stretch: 5-10 minutes

Full body workout - Day 5

• Exercise 1: 3 sets of 10-15 • Exercise 2: 3 sets of 8-12 • Stretch: 5-10 minutes

Rest/Stretch workout - Day 6

• Exercise 1: 3 sets of 10-15 • Exercise 2: 3 sets of 8-12 • Stretch: 5-10 minutes

HIIT workout - Day 7

• Exercise 1: 3 sets of 10-15 • Exercise 2: 3 sets of 8-12 • Stretch: 5-10 minutes

dev.description: Endurance workout plan for Beginner level with Minimal Equipment
dev.plan:
Day 1: Full Body Bodyweight Endurance Circuit

• Warm-up: 5 minutes light cardio (e.g., marching in place, arm circles)
• Bodyweight Squats: 3x15-20
• Push-ups (on knees or incline): 3x10-15
• Alternating Lunges: 3x10-12 per leg
• Plank: 3x30-45 seconds hold
• Modified Burpees (step-back): 3x8-10
• Cool-down: 5 minutes stretching

Day 2: Low-Intensity Steady State Cardio

• Brisk Walking / Light Jogging: 30-45 minutes at a conversational pace
• Gentle Dynamic Stretching: 10 minutes (e.g., leg swings, torso twists)

Day 3: Lower Body & Core Endurance

• Warm-up: 5 minutes light cardio
• Glute Bridges: 3x15-20
• Wall Sit: 3x30-60 seconds
• Calf Raises: 3x20-25
• Bicycle Crunches: 3x15-20 per side
• Reverse Crunches: 3x15-20
• Cool-down: 5 minutes stretching

Day 4: Upper Body & Core Endurance

• Warm-up: 5 minutes light cardio
• Incline Push-ups (against wall or sturdy surface): 3x12-18
• Chair Dips (triceps focus, using a sturdy chair): 3x10-15
• Plank Shoulder Taps: 3x10-12 per side
• Bird-Dog: 3x10-12 per side
• Supermans: 3x12-15
• Cool-down: 5 minutes stretching

Day 5: Endurance Interval Training (Bodyweight Cardio)

• Warm-up: 5 minutes light cardio
• Jumping Jacks: 3-4 rounds x 40s work, 20s rest
• High Knees: 3-4 rounds x 40s work, 20s rest
• Mountain Climbers: 3-4 rounds x 40s work, 20s rest
• Bodyweight Squats: 3-4 rounds x 40s work, 20s rest
• Rest 60-90 seconds between rounds.
• Cool-down: 5 minutes stretching

Day 6: Long Slow Distance Cardio

• Brisk Walking / Jogging / Cycling: 45-60 minutes at a steady, comfortable pace (you should be able to hold a conversation)
• Post-Workout Static Stretching: 10-15 minutes (holding each stretch for 20-30 seconds)

Day 7: Active Recovery & Flexibility

• Light Walking: 20-30 minutes
• Full Body Static Stretching: 20-30 minutes (focus on major muscle groups, holding each stretch for 20-30 seconds, breathe deeply)
